name: A Godzilla garden gnome
Description: Let those pesky, roving neighborhood gnomes know where they're not welcome.
features: A series of big-budget, narratively lackluster sequels not included.

name: baby mop
Description: It's never too early to teach your children about chores, as evidenced by this suit that lets your baby mop the house for you.
features: Cleaning Mop + Rompers = Babymop! Thanks to the Babymop your floor will stay clean all by itself

name: horror movie sound maker
Description: Surprise guests by making them think It is hiding just around the corner.
features: metal that makes sound with its metal components

name: pound of replica human fat
Description: If you've ever needed a means of convincing yourself not to go back for seconds, this rubbery pound of replica fat is sure to do the trick.
features: Plastic that it is similar to human fat

name: A pigeon mask
Description: You can finally roam the neighborhood in peace disguised in this lifelike pigeon mask. Hey, you might even get thrown a couple bread crumbs from sympathetic passersby!
